He finishes changing Sarah, places her back in her crib, then picks up Sarah's twin brother, PETER, from his crib -- which is good because he's been SLAMMING his head against the wall.Come on, buddy, we've talked about the head thing-- Dave places Peter on the changing table and opens his diaper. It's only wet, and Dave, pleasantly relieved, reaches for a fresh diaper...Oh no.Please, sweetheart, not my-- Honey, Daddy needs those--Take me with you Magnum P. I... Before long Dave is CRYING like a schoolgirl.Please take me with you...Terrific! Just terrific. We are nowAren't they? Yes. Always. Good morning, Rebecca.All but signed.Thank you, sir.No sir, absolutely not. So sorry. Dave quickly undoes his tie as Flemming turns down a hallway. SABRINA McARDLE, cute young paralegal, falls into step with Dave, stymieing laughter.Last week he told me my shoes were "dangerously Italian."Thanks, Sabrina.I have no idea what you're talking about, Gladys... She follows him, scolding:Yes, thank you, I almost forgot about them for like two seconds...Gladys, I'm a grown man, okay? He angrily punches "SPEAKER" on his RINGING phone as he reties his tie with a more traditional knot.Lockwood. A shrill, horribly impersonated British accent fills Dave's office -- as well as all of the surrounding offices.Jesus, Mitch, I'm at work--Dude, how stoned are you?Come on, it's 10 in the morning.What?That is great news.Kind of. Is there a reason you're calling or--?Dude, I'm coming--Really? Whose feelings?Look, just, what time are you picking me up tonight?Dude, I get it, I'm coming--Oh, I'm a Many-Spotted Skipperling man all the way. The Southern Monarch is just a glorified moth.Oh, I'm sorry, sugar-bug... Dave looks genuinely concerned. Cara just shrugs and keeps reading her butterfly book. Jamie whispers to him:Right, of course. Jamie finally notices Dave's foam-covered face, and softens.Of course he's early. All he does all day is eat hummus and masturbate.Bathed, changed and in their Pis. Mitch turns to see Dave in khakis and a buttondown, entering the kitchen with the freshly bathed twins. Mitch grins:I'll be back right after the game, okay, Pumpkin?Yeah, I'm good.Yeah, well, you're driving, so... Mitch shrugs and slides the spare beer into his chest pocket.You found another futon?Nice. What movie?Sounds cool.I hope you get it, man.No, man, I got a big day tomorrow, I can't get wasted tonight.He's no Fernando.OH! So finish your story! The girl calls you up...?What's her name?Incredible. What's her last name? Mitch just looks at him.Is she hot? She is, right? Oh my God I already have a boner!NO! Keep going! I need these stories, man! They're all I have. Mitch registers the desperation in his married friend's eyes.Oh my God how big?Oh my God she sounds like Sabrina.This hot paralegal in my office.What's a Cancer List?That's sick, man. Jamie is the mother of my children...Just finish your story, man! I'm dying over here!I don't even know what those are!That is maybe the single greatest story I've ever heard in my life.I don't know why...I don't know why I've always been in such a rush, you know?You remember me in high school, I was always so focussed on getting into a good college, then when I got to college, I was so focussed on getting into a good law school, then in law school I was just trying to land a job at a good firm, then Jamie and I got married and we had Cara right away-- I just feel like and I missed out on all the fun stuff, you know? The sex, the drugs, the bad choices, and now it's too late. I blew it. I pissed away my 20's, and now I'm staring down the barrel a seriously boring life.No, I know--Wait, what?Don't get me wrong, I love my kids, I do, I would take a bullet for them, but...remember that heroin addict you dated?Jesus, how many heroin addicts have you dated?Anyway. Having kids is like dating a heroin addict, only instead of dating them, they move into your house for 18 years. They're laughing one second and crying the next and then they're trying to kill themselves in your bathroom for no reason. They're mean and selfish and they burn through all your money and they steal your shit and they break everything and they stay up all night and they listen to really shitty music and the dirty secret is, no one actually likes kids.No! It's true. Everyone pretends to like kids because if you don't you look like a huge dick. It's like Drew Barrymore or jazz. No one actually likes them, but if you say that out loud, everybody hates you.I'm just saying: don't fuck up your life like I did, okay?Wait, what--?Tatiana! I want Tatiana! I want sex with strange new women and maybe also with Sabrina if she's single and I want to wake up at noon and smoke weed all afternoon and I want to not think about the needs of four other people 24 hours a day and I want to start reading a novel and actually finish it and I want to take a solid shit because I'm not constantly stressed out and I want to learn how to rollerblade and also I really want to pee...Bingo. They stumble over to the fountain, unzip their pants, and, leaning on each other, begin peeing into it. Mitch glances up at the GREEK GODDESS METIS. She scowls down at them.Maybe she has three kids and a job she hates.I'm just saying...I envy your life.Yeah you don't--No, I do--!R-Rolling blackout?You really have nice flow by the way. Very thick and confident.Thank you. My urologist says I run a little warm. Eventually they both finish, tuck in, and zip up. Beat.You good to drive?Mitch...?Why am I in your sad apartment--Fine, Jesus, relax-- Dave opens the door to see himself standing there.What the fuck is this...? Dave backpedals, terrified, as Mitch blows inside, furious.Oh my God...I'm a fucking loser...How the fuck did this happen?!What, switching bodies with another human being?! Oh yeah, this shit happens to me like twice a week!Oh, you don't want to be me?! No, no, no: I don't want to be you!Look, let's just.. .think. How could this have possibly happened...? They pace about the apartment, trying to think... Then:Not dreaming.Wait, what'd you just say?Come on!Remember last night when we peed into that fountain?! As we peed, we wished we had each other's lives!Our wishes must've... somehow... come true.Well apparently urine works too.We're gonna hug each other and pee into the fountain and wish our lives back!Where did you take it?!Who could tell us where it is?!When will it be in the computer?!Tomorrow?! We can't wait until tomorrow, Carla!We'll call you tomorrow! Mitch covers his mouth like he just won American Idol.Oh my God: and I've got my closing today.A big--?! Yeah! Whether or not I make partner is riding on this!No. No. We can't just be each other for a day, Mitch! You have no idea how to be a lawyer!First of all, it's Busted Dreams 4, okay? They look at each other, cooling off a bit...Are...Are we actually considering doing this...?All right, well, my meeting starts in 45 minutes. Jamie raises her eyebrow, oh?I know.Tuesdays, Wednesdays, mornings, late night, I'm like Denny's, baby, I'm open 24-7. She laughs, and he scoops her up and heads upstairs...Sugar-bug!So. How's it going with Sabrina?Wow. Good for you. Mitch nods, proud, I know. Swigs his beer.Maybe.I can't believe they're family friends.Oh yeah. Dave flips the burgers.Hey, the CEO owed me a favor...I think so too. Just then, MITCH'S DAD approaches.Is it weird that I miss your penis?

Before Dave can answer, the doorbell rings, DING-DONG! Mitch shields his eyes with his hands, shocked and disgusted.What are you talking about? Mitch finally notices he's in DAVE'S BEDROOM...Um, yeah?Are you insane?Are you still drunk?What?Dave is right here! You're Dave! He turns and sees himself in the mirror. Freezes. He is Dave.Hey.You staying for dinner? Silence. Then Mitch nudges Dave.Okay, but make it quick, I've got to put the twins to bed.Great! Sounds like a plan.Okay, Mitch, first of all, don't call me baby, it's creepy. Second of all... what the hell are you talking about?.When's our wedding anniversary? Dave freezes, oh shit.Spring?I really don't have time to--What's my favorite color?Fine, what did we talk about two nights ago...? I was crying...?That's great, Mitch. Thanks a big bunch. Come on, honey. Jamie steams upstairs, pissed, with Cara in tow. Dave runs his hands through his hair, fuck! Mitch looks appalled:I have to cool it on the Thai food. I've had the shits all day.Seriously -- light a candle. She keeps shitting. It sounds like Niagara Falls. Thunderous. Foregoing the candle, Mitch covers his nose with his forearm and stumbles out of the bathroom, nauseous...What is your problem?Your turn.It's your turn to feed the twins.Are you fucking kidding me?Get the fuck out bed right now and go feed your fucking children or I will fucking cut you! Mitch is already scrambling out of the room, terrified.Dave's in the shower.Just tell me honestly...is Dave having an affair?Temporary? We've been in this rough patch for yearsYou don't want to hear about this.It's not his fault, really...I love him with all my heart, you know I do, but-you remember Dave's family growing up. They were a mess. They had nothing. Dave's entire childhood was spent looking over the fence, wanting a better life. So he scrimped and saved and worked four jobs at once and put himself through school and built a better life for himself. I've always loved that about him.No one ever gave him anything. The problem is, now that he's got a good life, he can't turn it off -- he's still looking over the fence, wanting something even better, a second house, more kids, a faster car, a bigger promotion, whatever it is that he thinks will finally make him happy. Dave reddens, defensive; this is hitting very close to home.Um, I'm going to work?You guys okay in there?Okay...? See you later... We hear Jamie's FOOTSTEPS retreat. Dave grows emotional:Uh oh, here comes the second battement glisse... Jamie tenses up. Mitch does too... As Cara starts her spin, Nicolette Peters goes to push her over -- and Cara calmly grabs her arm, FLIPS her over her shoulder, and drops her flat on her back with a loud WHAM! You should never use violence, except to defend yourself, okay? Mitch subtly shakes his head at Cara, don't listen to her.Dave!I'm so proud of you, baby. You worked so hard for this... Mitch winces, knowing just how wrong she is. All around him, the partners stand, APPLAUDING. Mitch stands, a bit dizzy.I thought you might be having an affair... but not with Gladys:You know what? No more excuses! The next time you see my asshole husband tell him that I will never. Ever. Take him back, you got that?! Dave nods quickly, terrified.Sabrina!
